import { UnorderedList } from '@looker/components'
import { Editor, excludedProps } from '@looker/storybook'
import { ArgsTable, Meta } from '@storybook/addon-docs'
import storyBasic from '!!raw-loader!./Basic'
import storyBullet from '!!raw-loader!./Bullet'
import storyColor from '!!raw-loader!./Color'

<Meta component={UnorderedList} title="Docs/UnorderedList" />

# UnorderedList

The `UnorderedList` component renders a `ul` element. Its children should be `li` elements.

<Editor code={storyBasic} />

## Types

Use the `type` prop to set the `UnorderedList`'s marker type.

`UnorderedList`s be of type "none" (default) or "bullet".

<Editor code={storyBullet} />

## Color

Use the `color` prop to set the `UnorderedList`'s color.

<Editor code={storyColor} />

<ArgsTable of={UnorderedList} exclude={excludedProps} />
